org.spongepowered.api

Interface Game


  • public interface Game
    The core accessor of the API. The implementation uses this to pass constructed objects.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      CommandService getCommandDispatcher()
      Get the command dispatcher used for registering and dispatching registered commands.
      EventManager getEventManager()
      Gets the EventManager.
      Platform getPlatform()
      Returns the current platform, or implementation, this Game is running on.
      PluginManager getPluginManager()
      Gets the PluginManager.
      GameRegistry getRegistry()
      Gets the GameRegistry.
      File getSavesDirectory()
      Gets the saves directory where World data currently resides.
      SchedulerService getScheduler()
      Gets the scheduler used to schedule tasks.
      Server getServer()
      Gets the Server.
      ServiceManager getServiceManager()
      Get the game's instance of the service manager, which is the gateway to various services provided by Sponge (command registration and so on).
      TeleportHelper getTeleportHelper()
      Gets the TeleportHelper, used to find safe Locations.

    • Method Detail

      • getPlatform

        Platform getPlatform()
        Returns the current platform, or implementation, this Game is running on.
        Returns:
        The current implementation

      • getServer

        Server getServer()
        Gets the Server.
        Returns:
        The server

      • getPluginManager

        PluginManager getPluginManager()
        Gets the PluginManager.
        Returns:
        The plugin manager

      • getEventManager

        EventManager getEventManager()
        Gets the EventManager.
        Returns:
        The event manager

      • getRegistry

        GameRegistry getRegistry()
        Gets the GameRegistry.
        Returns:
        The game registry

      • getServiceManager

        ServiceManager getServiceManager()
        Get the game's instance of the service manager, which is the gateway to various services provided by Sponge (command registration and so on).

        Services registered by other plugins may be available too.

        Returns:
        The service manager

      • getScheduler

        SchedulerService getScheduler()
        Gets the scheduler used to schedule tasks.
        Returns:
        The scheduler

      • getCommandDispatcher

        CommandService getCommandDispatcher()
        Get the command dispatcher used for registering and dispatching registered commands.
        Returns:
        The command dispatcher

      • getTeleportHelper

        TeleportHelper getTeleportHelper()
        Gets the TeleportHelper, used to find safe Locations.
        Returns:
        The teleport helper

      • getSavesDirectory

        File getSavesDirectory()
        Gets the saves directory where World data currently resides.
        Returns:
        The directory
